meanings.definition: A file containing instructions or information about how to use a software program.
meanings.sent1: I always check the readme before installing any new software.
meanings.sent2: The readme file helped me set up the program on my computer.
meanings.sent3: The readme was like a map guiding me through the software jungle.
meanings.sent4: The readme acted as a wise mentor, showing me the way to navigate the program.
meanings.sent5: The readme was my trusty companion, revealing all the secrets of the software.

meanings.definition: To look at and understand the meaning of written or printed words.
meanings.sent1: I will readme the book to find the answer.
meanings.sent2: She likes to readme slowly to fully grasp the story.
meanings.sent3: He tried to readme the menu upside down for fun.
meanings.sent4: Reading the poem made her readme the world in a new light.
meanings.sent5: The detective could readme the clues hidden in the mysterious letter.
